name: Urban Sprout
description:
- In this cute puzzle game you play as Arti, a rurel farmer that's moved to the big city. Arti's goal is to clear out their new garden in the city of trash and to grow blooming beautiful flowers. Clear out your garden as quick as you can before Arti becomes overburdened.

Devs:

 - Jasmine Chae - Lead Designer/Artist

 - Sean Campbell - Lead Programmer

 - Benjamin Maxwell Woodburn - Sound Design/Composer

 - Chen - Supporting Artist/Animator

 - Darian Williams - Supporting Programmer

 - Parker Duffie - Team Lead
